   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to my dissertation's documentation!
===========================================
This dissertation is a reproducibility exercise in which the results of the paper *Linearly Constrained Gaussian Processes* is replicated.
Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information, including how to :ref:`install <installation>` the project.

.. note::
   This project is under active development and the documentation is not yet complete.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

==================

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`
